item.description:
Welcome to the New Haven/Southern CT Meetup Group (the NHSCMG? hmmmmm...)

This will be the very first Meetup for designers in New Haven - it's about time!

We'll start at 5.30 in the back bar at Bentara and run till 7.30 or whenever. Please come, bring friends, and bring a design piece by you or another that you like or find interesting for some reason - could be a logo, card, printout of a website, direct mail piece, anything. We'll pass them around and share and eat delicious little satays and so forth. And perhaps a drink special too.
item.name: New Haven/Southern CT Graphic Design August Meetup
